title: The Ice Cavern
description: A frozen cavern inhabited by strange and dangerous creatures.

special_abilities: Cold Resistance: Takes half damage from cold
Regeneration 3: Heals 3 HP per round unless hit by fire
Fly: Can hover and dodge easily

nodes.title: Frozen Entrance
nodes.description: You stand before a cavern entrance. Ice crystals sparkle in the dim light, and you can hear strange sounds echoing from within.

nodes.title: Chamber of Frost
nodes.description: Two frost sprites materialize from the icy mist, their crystalline wings glittering menacingly!

nodes.title: The Ice Troll's Lair
nodes.description: A massive ice troll emerges from the shadows, its frozen breath visible in the frigid air. This is the guardian of the cavern!

nodes.title: Victory!
nodes.description: You emerge from the ice cavern victorious, your pockets heavy with treasure and tales of your brave deeds!

nodes.title: Retreat
nodes.description: Sometimes discretion is the better part of valor. You return home safely, though without glory or treasure.
